about.heading: Advanced Forensics Made Simple

cards.text: Our engine scans every pixel and phoneme, detecting visual artifacts and warping invisible to the naked human eye.

cards.heading: Multimodal Fusion
cards.text: We cross-reference audio wave patterns with facial landmarks to spot subtle lip-sync errors and emotion mismatches.

cards.heading: Enterprise Security
cards.text: Bank-level encryption and isolated workspaces ensure your sensitive investigations and evidence remain confidential.
